trans-unit.source: Specifies how to draw the gradient outside a gradient brush's gradient vector or space.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何繪製漸層筆刷的漸層向量或空間之外的漸層。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示可用的模式方法和其影響<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.

A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>定義其漸層的空間和其<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>定義其漸層的空間和其<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![Different GradientSpread settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "Different GradientSpread settings") Gradient spread methods
trans-unit.target: ![不同的 GradientSpread 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "不同的 GradientSpread 設定")漸層擴展方法

trans-unit.source: The color values at the ends of the gradient vector fill the remaining space.
trans-unit.target: 漸層向量結尾的色彩值填滿剩餘的空間。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the reverse direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: 之前的空間填滿漸層重複方向會相反。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the original direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: 漸層是以原始方向重複，直到的空間填滿。
